about.title: About Me
about.description: With a passion for both technology and design, I develop scalable, high-performance applications that captivate users and drive success.

projects.title: Linux Kernel Module for Process Resource Monitoring
projects.description: Developed a Linux kernel module to track heap memory usage and open file counts for monitored processes.

projects.title: Cloud-Based Encrypted Password Manager
projects.description: Built a secure, cloud-hosted password manager using Microsoft Azure for both storage and authentication. Incorporated strong encryption to maintain data privacy. Engineered a scalable system for safe credential management with controlled access and retrieval. Leveraged Azure cloud services to improve security, reliability, and performance for practical deployment.

projects.title: Social Media Analysis for Disaster Management Using Graph Neural Networks
projects.description: Examined the role of social media in disaster response by analyzing real-time data using Graph Neural Networks (GNNs). Applied GraphSAGE, GCN, and GAT for classification, along with sentiment analysis and topic modeling to extract critical insights. Focused on text preprocessing, graph-based learning, and disaster-related social media trends.
